thread.title: Enjoy clear skies and chilly weather this weekend as air quality improves
thread.title_full: Enjoy clear skies and chilly weather this weekend as air quality improves

title: Enjoy clear skies and chilly weather this weekend as air quality improves
text:
Enjoy clear skies and chilly weather this weekend as air quality improves Oct 11, 2024 Oct 11, 2024 Updated 16 mins ago Facebook WhatsApp SMS Print Copy article link Save Cooler temperatures and improved air quality have made a noticeable difference in Montana, providing much-needed relief from recent heat. With a dry finish to the work week and what looks like a picturesque weekend ahead, it’s the perfect time to enjoy the outdoors before the next cold front arrives. Keep an eye on potential gusty winds, especially for those near the Montana-Idaho State Line.
